task.title: Stacks Landing Page
task.shortdesc: This screen allows you to view a list of your CloudFormation stacks, create new stacks, update existing stacks, and delete stacks. Use the scroll bar to view additional stacks not in the browser's current view.

taskbody.prereq: To access this page from the dashboard, click Stacks from the left navigation bar under CLOUDFORMATION or click the Stacks icon (cloud with lightning bolt) to display the Stacks landing page:

step.cmd: From the dashboard, click Create stack beneath the Stacks icon.
From the Stacks landing page, click the CREATE STACK button near the top of the page.

taskbody.result:
The Create new stack page opens.
For additional information on completing that page, refer to the instructions provided in its Help content.

task.title: View Details of a Stack
task.shortdesc: You can see details about a stack, such as its status, the resources associated with it, templates used, and events associated with it.

taskbody.context: To see more details about a stack:

step.cmd: Click the name in the list of stacks to display detailed information about the selected stack.
In the Actions column, click the action icon (･･･) for the stack you want to view and select View details.
step.stepresult: The details page for the selected stack opens. For further information about the details page, refer to its Help content.

task.title: Actions
task.shortdesc: Each entry in the stacks list has a context menu, accessible from the Actions column. Clicking the action icon brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected stack.

taskbody.context:
The following context menu actions are available:
View details. Brings up the detail page for selected stack.
Update stack. Allows you to update the selected stack.
Delete stack. Allows you to delete the selected stack.
